info.description:
The Syndesis REST API connects to back-end services on the Syndesis and provides a
                      single entry point for the Syndesis UI. For
                      console developement it can run in
                      off-line mode where it only serves responses from the response cache.
info.title: Syndesis API

post.summary: Creates a new Connector based on the ConnectorTemplate identified by the provided `id`  and the data given in `connectorSettings`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the result list according to the given field value

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Sorting direction when a 'sort' field is provided. Can be 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records per page

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query to filter results on

post.summary: Retrieves enriched action definition, that is an action definition that has input/output data shapes and property enums defined with respect to the given action properties

200.description: A map of zero or more action property suggestions keyed by the property name

get.summary: Responds with specification that defines this integration

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the integration

204.description: Empty specification provided when definining this integration

404.description: No specification resource defines this integration

put.summary: For an integration that is generated from a specification updates it so it conforms to the updated specification

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the integration

parameters.name: specification
parameters.description: Next revision of the specification
